original_text: When the season came, he sent a servant to the tenants to get from them some of the fruit of the vineyard.
korean_text: 때가 이르매 농부들에게 포도원 소출 얼마를 받으려고 한 종을 보내니

sentences.original_text: he sent a servant to the tenants,
to get from them some of the fruit of the vineyard.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들에게서 포도원의 과실 얼마를 거두기 위해,
